author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...RAYMOND FORMS OFF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...RAYMOND FORMS OFF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 12:00 PM CST Thu Oct 09 the center of Raymond was located near 16.1, -101.0 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...RAYMOND FORMS OFF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 12:00 PM CST Thu Oct 09 the center of Raymond was located near 16.1, -101.0 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Raymond (EP2/EP172025)
